question: The early Qadiris formed their hospices in the Deccan, under the patronage of the which of the following Bahmani sultan?
explanation: The Qadiris were orthodox Sufis and also zealously followed the Shariah law. The early Qadiris formed their hospices in the Deccan, under the patronage of the Bahmani sultan, Ala-ud-Din Ahmed Shah Bahmani.
